mapper.select: SELECT C.CON_ID , AT.CON_ID , AT.SEQ , AT.ALT_DIV , AT.ALT_CON_DATE , AT.CON_ST_DATE , AT.CON_ED_DATE , AT.SUPP_AMT , AT.VAT_AMT , AT.REMARK , AT.CONFIRM_YN , AT.CON_NO , CU.CUST_NM FROM BM_CON_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_ALT AT ON C.CON_ID = AT.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CUST_INFO CU ON C.CUST_ID = CU.CUST_ID WHERE C.CON_ID = #{value}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT C.CON_ID , C.CON_NO AS CN , C.CON_NM , C.CON_FST_DATE , C.CUST_ID , AT.SEQ , AT.ALT_DIV , AT.ALT_CON_DATE , AT.CON_ST_DATE , AT.CON_ED_DATE , AT.SUPP_AMT , AT.VAT_AMT , AT.REMARK , AT.CONFIRM_YN , AT.CON_NO , AT.CREATED_AT , AT.CREATED_BY , AT.UPDATED_AT , AT.UPDATED_BY
FROM BM_CON_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_ALT AT ON C.CON_ID = AT.CON_ID
C.CONFIRM_YN = "Y"
AND (C.CON_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR AT.ALT_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%'))
GROUP BY C.CON_ID, AT.SEQ DESC) AS A GROUP BY CON_ID
